title: Irwin Naturals 2-IN-1 Kidney & Liver Super Cleanse | The Healthy Place
description: Balance Your Body With A Powerful 10-Day Botanical Cleanse! Buy Irwin Naturals 2 In 1 Kidney and Liver Super Cleanse To Remove Toxins and Restore Wellness!
cleaned_text: Cleanse [Irwin Naturals](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/brand/irwin-naturals/) Full Price 2 in stock 60 Liquid Soft-Gels Balance your body with Irwin Naturals 2 in 1 Kidney and Liver Super Cleans, a powerful 10-day botanical cleanse to remove toxins and restore wellness.* - Promotes optimal liver and kidney function* - Supports the body's natural cleanse and detoxification processes* - Relieves occasional discomfort* - Boosts overall kidney, liver, and urinary tract health* - Contains botanical ingredients like milk thistle, artichoke, reishi, stinging nettle - No preservatives added Irwin Naturals 2-IN-1 Kidney & Liver Super Cleanse Imagine a botanical blend that cleanses our system of toxins, nourishes our whole body with real-food ingredients, and restores our health balance in just 10 days. That's what you can experience when you buy Irwin Naturals 2 in 1 Kidney and Liver Super Cleanse! Do you know just how important our kidneys and liver are to our everyday health? They work double time to ensure that the harmful toxins we encounter from our food and our environment are flushed out and eliminated from our system. While our liver and kidneys are working hard to balance our bodies, we can offer them extra support. With Irwin Naturals 2 in 1 Kidney and Liver Super Cleanse, we experience powerful, whole-body support to enhance our natural cleansing and detoxification process. Even better, it's perfect for a 10-day super cleanse! With a comprehensive and balanced formula of supportive botanicals, this [liver and kidney cleanse supplement](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/product-category/digestion-supplements/cleanse-detox/) is your new go-to for more vibrant energy and overall wellness.* - Milk thistle: Milk thistle contains silymarin, which is a powerful antioxidant and great for liver support by regenerating liver cells, cleansing our blood, and protecting against oxidative stress!* - Stinging nettle: Stinging nettle has been used in many traditional remedies to reduce the symptoms of many urinary tract problems and seasonal allergies.* - Dandelion seeds: The polysaccharides naturally found in dandelions help our liver to produce bile, filter out toxins, and relieve any stress.* - Corn silk: Corn silk has antioxidant properties, minimizes fat in the liver, and also promotes liver, kidney and urinary health.* - Cranberry: This tart berry soothes urinary tract discomfort and protects the liver from damage.* - Uva ursi: Similar to cranberry, this berry aids urinary health and acts as a natural astringent.* - Fish oil: Fish oil is great for cutting down on the fat built up in our liver, boosting overall liver function, and promoting healthy inflammation levels.* - Artichoke: Artichokes assist our body to flush out toxins and may even boost liver cell regeneration.* - Barberry: Barberry has been used in traditional herbal medicine for years! It's been used to soothe the symptoms of common stomach problems like diarrhea, upset stomach, and inflammation.* - Reishi mushroom: Another natural herbal remedy, the reishi mushroom is known for its adaptogenic properties. In this case, reishi balances the enzymes in our liver and delivers antioxidant benefits.* - NAC: This amino acid encourages the production of antioxidants to further enhance detoxification.* - Elderberry: Boost your immunity and your liver and kidney health at the same time with the help of elderberry extract.* Better balance starts today! For an intensive kidney and liver cleanse formula that's specially designed for your overall health and wellness, buy Irwin Naturals 2 in 1 Kidney and Liver Super Cleanse!* Have a question about Irwin Naturals 2 in 1 Kidney and Liver Super Cleanse, or any of our other [liver and kidney cleanse supplements](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/product-category/digestion-supplements/cleanse-detox/)? Our certified Wellness Consultants are happy to help! Click on the LiveChat button to get your answers right away! Suggested Use: (Adult) take three (3) Liquid Soft-Gels twice daily with a meal and a full glass (8oz) of water. This product is intended for short term use only. Limit use to 10 consecutive days. Optimal hydration should be maintained throughout duration of use. Cautions: Keep out of the reach of children. Consult a physician before taking this product if you are taking any medications, or have any medical conditions, including a history of kidney stones. Do not use if you have a bile duct obstruction. Do not use if you may become pregnant, are pregnant, or nursing. Do not exceed recommended daily intake. Not intended for use for persons under 18. Questions? We've got answers! Click the LiveChat button in the lower right hand side of your screen to start talking with one of our Wellness Consultants or [ call one of our stores](https://findyourhealthyplace.com/contact/) to speak with a member of our team. Serving Size: 3 Liquid Soft-Gels Servings Per Container: 20 Ingredients: Vitamin C (as Ascorbic Acid), Vitamin D (as Cholecalciferol), Vitamin B6 (as Pyridoxine Hydrochloride), Vitamin B12 L-Selenomethionine), Potassium (as Potassium Citrate), Fish Oil (18% EPA, 324 mg, 12% DHA, 216 mg), Milk Thistle extract (10:1) (leaf), Corn gingerols) (rhizome) annatto (color), turmeric (color), maltodextrin, dextrin, titanium dioxide (color), silicon dioxide, sodium copper chlorophyllin (color), dicalcium phosphate and mannitol Contains: Fish (anchovy, sardine), Soy The mission is simple: heal the world with plant medicine. In 1994, Klee Irwin had a vision to accomplish that mission, so he founded Irwin Naturals. Instead of funneling his money into marketing or advertising, he decided to invest his sparse savings into potent supplements. The result? Over the decades, customers noticed that spending their money on these incredible supplements had a profound impact on their health! What started as a small following has expanded to millions of loyal fans, allowing Klee to accomplish his mission one person at a time through the power of plants. Plants are naturally rich in vitamins, minerals, and botanical ingredients that contribute to a healthy diet and lifestyle. No matter your health conditions, Irwin Naturals trusts that plants can heal and revitalize your mind and body! Since the 1990s, Irwin Naturals continues to produce high-quality supplements that are affordable, absorbable, and potent. But here's what really sets them apart from the competition: all of their products are in the form of liquid soft gels! Traditional tablets and capsules sometimes include filler ingredients and are often difficult for our bodies to absorb. That's not the case with Irwin Naturals soft gels! Each one contains BioPerine Complex, a black pepper extract with added ginger that boosts absorption. On top of easy-to-digest soft gels, you can trust the quality standards of all Irwin Natural products. Besides being completed in the USA, all supplements are tested for quality, compliance, and regulations. In fact, they only utilize hemp grown in the United States! Ready to heal your body with plant medicine?
